name: nwd
description: pure node.js implementation of Selenium WebDriver Wire Protocol
author: 2do2go team <dev.2do2go@gmail.com>

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint . && { if [ -z $NODE_TESTUI_BROWSER ] || [ $NODE_TESTUI_BROWSER == 'phantom' ]; then npm run testPhantom; else npm run _test; fi }
scripts.testPhantom: { phantomjs --webdriver 127.0.0.1:4444 --ignore-ssl-errors yes > ./phantomjs.log 2>&1 & } && ID=$! && echo 'Wait for phantom start...' && while [ "`grep 'running on port' ./phantomjs.log`" = "" ]; do sleep 0.1; done && npm run _test; kill $ID
